content.headline: Ambev: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
content.summary: SAO PAULO (AP) — Ambev SA (ABEV) on Thursday reported second-quarter earnings of $459.8 million. On a per-share basis, the Sao Paulo-based company said it had profit of 3 cents. The beverage company posted revenue of $3.85 billion in the period.
